entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
